sentences.en: He called the success a vindication of his party's free-market economic policy.
sentences.cn: 他称这次成功证明了他的政党的自由市场经济政策是正确的。

sentences.en: Anti-nuclear protesters regarded the Chernobyl accident as a clear vindication of their campaign.
sentences.cn: 反核示威者认为，切尔诺贝利核电站核泄漏事故清楚地表明他们的反核运动是正确的。
